Webhosting UK Com Ltd. (WHUK), a renowned web hosting company in the UK since 2001, offers professional grade VPS hosting service over Dell hardware hosted in Tier IV datacenter facility.

With our latest promo on VPS Hosting, our entire range of plans has become even more affordable and value for money proposition!

Here’s what you can avail through this latest promotion:

Use Discount Coupon – “VPSSAVE10” to avail 10% OFF on Quarterly Purchase
Use Discount Coupon – “VPSSAVE15” to avail 15% OFF on Semi-Annual Purchase
Use Discount Coupon – “VPSSAVE20” to avail 20% OFF on Annual Purchase

This is a limited time offer and ends on Sunday 18 October 2015, 11.59pm BST. So rush to get yours today!
